author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Ordnance Factory Day celebrated at the Ordnance Factory, Tiruchi, on Friday was marked by a slew of programmes.

An exhibition displaying a range of products manufactured by Ordnance Factory, Tiruchi, was organised on the occasion at the Ordnance Factory estate.

The celebration was marked by planting of saplings by officers and employees near the OFT Higher Secondary School ground.

A reverse osmosis plant was inaugurated by the factory General Manager K. Appa Rao in Type-III Park.

Earlier, Mr. Appa Rao hoisted the Ordnance Factories flag and administered pledge to the workmen, staff and officers, a press release from the factory said.

Every year March 18 is observed as Ordnance Factory Day by the Ordnance Factories across the country.
title: Ordnance Factory Day celebrated
